Articles.Content:
![goodbyejebediah.png](http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/8859/goodbyejebediah.png)

The moment before they die.

Found this quite entertaining, so I decided to post a useless thread on the forum ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Pfft.

It\'s funny when Jebidah dies from an completely confusing and unexpected explosion.
You should get 14. The demo sucks compared to all the new stuff we now have.

Considering everything the demo offers, I hardly consider it to be subpar. Just because it lacks some features doesn\'t mean it is any less fun. Degrading a demo of this quality does the entire game a disservice.

> 
> You should get 14. The demo sucks compared to all the new stuff we now have.

I have 14, but this is an old screenshot of mine :]

> 
> Considering everything the demo offers, I hardly consider it to be subpar. Just because it lacks some features doesn\'t mean it is any less fun. Degrading a demo of this quality does the entire game a disservice.

Yes, it\'s a good *demo*, but there are no plug-ins or new terrain engines. Persistence also doesn\'t exist... So, Harv and those guys really made the full game a lot better, and the community has contributed so much to the game that it makes it WAY more fun to play than the demo.
